  • Constructor Details

    • TypeOfRoom

      public TypeOfRoom(String typeOfRoom, int occuMin, int occuMax, double[] dailyRates)
      creates room object with type occupancy and rate
      Parameters:
      typeOfRoom - The room type e.g. Deluxe Single
      occuMax - the max amount of occupants
      occuMin - the min amount of occupants
      dailyRates - rates of the room based on day, e.g. [0] monday,[1] tuesday etc...

    • TypeOfRoom

      public TypeOfRoom(String typeOfRoom, int occuMin, int occuMax, double[] dailyRates, int numAvailable)
      creates room object with type occupancy and rate
      Parameters:
      typeOfRoom - The room type e.g. Deluxe Single
      occuMax - the max amount of occupants
      occuMin - the min amount of occupants
      dailyRates - rates of the room based on day, e.g. [0] monday,[1] tuesday etc...
      numAvailable - THe max number of rooms available.
